summary: I HAVE PURCHASED A 2002 YAMAHA GRIZZLY,AND I HAVE A PROBLEM WITH THE GAS BOILING.  I HAVE BEEN ON A WEB SITE ATV NATION AND IT SEEMS THAT A LOT OF PEOPLE LIKE ME ARE HAVING THE SAME PROBLEM.  IT CUTS OUT, VAPOR LOCKS AND THE GAS IS ACTUALLY BOILING IN THE GAS TANK.  TO ME THIS IS A VERY BIG PROBLEM AND NEEDS SOME ATTENTION AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.   *NLM
